items.name: Potion
items.description: Restores 20 HP to one ally.

items.name: Ether
items.description: Restores 10 MP to one ally.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: Cures poison status.

items.name: Acorn
items.description: A hard acorn. Can be thrown at enemies or given to squirrels.

items.name: Honey Drop
items.description: Sweet honey. Restores 5 HP and tastes delicious.

items.name: Pet Treat
items.description: A tasty snack for your pet companion. Boosts morale!

items.name: Fancy Collar
items.description: A stylish collar for your pet. Makes them look adorable!

items.name: Squeaky Toy
items.description: A fun toy that keeps your pet entertained.

items.name: Hi-Potion
items.description: Restores 50 HP to one ally.

items.name: Mega Potion
items.description: Restores 30 HP to all allies.

items.name: Hi-Ether
items.description: Restores 30 MP to one ally.

items.name: Elixir
items.description: Fully restores HP and MP to one ally.

items.name: Eye Drops
items.description: Clears blurry vision and cures blindness.

items.name: Alarm Clock
items.description: A loud noise that wakes up sleeping allies.

items.name: Smelling Salts
items.description: Strong-smelling salts that cure stun and confusion.

items.name: Remedy
items.description: Cures all status ailments.

items.name: Bomb
items.description: Explodes on impact, dealing fire damage to one enemy.

items.name: Smoke Bomb
items.description: Creates a smoke screen, guaranteeing escape from battle.

items.name: Flash Powder
items.description: Blinds all enemies temporarily.

items.name: Stink Bomb
items.description: Poisons all enemies with a terrible smell.

items.name: Fresh Pastry
items.description: A delicious pastry from the caf√©. Restores 15 HP.

items.name: Berry
items.description: A sweet berry. Can be eaten for a small heal or used in cooking.

items.name: Lantern
items.description: A sturdy lantern that illuminates dark areas. Essential for exploring caves and the deep forest.

items.name: Journal
items.description: A personal journal for recording discoveries and clues about the mysterious happenings.

items.name: Lasso
items.description: A strong rope lasso for catching runaway critters and pulling distant objects.

items.name: Flute
items.description: A magical flute that can calm wild creatures and reveal hidden paths.

items.name: Fishing Rod
items.description: A trusty fishing rod. Cast it at a fishing spot to catch fish!

items.name: Common Carp
items.description: A basic fish found in most waters. Can be sold or cooked.

items.name: Spotted Trout
items.description: A pretty fish with colorful spots. Quite valuable.

items.name: Silver Minnow
items.description: A tiny shimmering fish. Used as bait.

items.name: Rainbow Bass
items.description: A colorful fish that sparkles. A nice catch!

items.name: Golden Koi
items.description: A rare and beautiful golden fish. Very valuable!

items.name: Bubble Fish
items.description: A peculiar fish from Bubblegum Bay. Blows bubbles!

items.name: Forest Catfish
items.description: A shy catfish from the forest streams.

items.name: Crystal Perch
items.description: A legendary fish with glowing crystal scales! Extremely rare.
